title: H3 Humanities & Soc Sci Research Prog
description:
The H3 Humanities and Social Sciences Research
Programme is offered to Junior College students who
have exceptional ability and aptitude in Malay
Language and Literature. The student will embark on
an independent study and research under the
supervision of a NUS academic and will be assessed via
an extended essay.
prerequisite:
Reading the relevant H2 subject – Malay Language and
Literature.
